from sys import stdin

readi = lambda: int(stdin.readline())
readis = lambda: map(int, stdin.readline().split())


T = readi()
for _ in xrange(T):
    N = readi()
    arrs = readis()
    deps = readis()

    maxi = max(max(arrs), max(deps))
    sumn = [0] * (maxi + 1)

    for (a, d) in zip(arrs, deps):
        for i in xrange(a, d):
            sumn[i] += 1

    print max(sumn)
